infos.value: Enemy reinforcements!
They don't seem like just any old bandits.
It could be that a foreign power is pulling their strings.
You might be right.
Do you truly believe such a thing?
What reason would we have to lie?
If not Leonis, then... Could they be in the service of Wezette!?
It's possible.
Hourne and Wezette are at odds with one another, after all...
Choose your words wisely, Mont.
Lest you have forgotten, Wezette and Leonis are on friendly terms.
Oh, f-forgive my carelessness...
Right now, it doesn't matter from whence these thugs hail.
The problem is their numbers! Any thoughts, King Oelde?
Meeting force with force is not the Leonis way.
I take it you have a plan?
Abandon the carriage. Retreat to the forest.
Y-you can't be serious! In this rain, Lady Machérie will—
Be just fine.
We are in Leonis, after all. Let us do as the lions do.
Mont, guard Lady Machérie.
Y-yes, Father!
Mont...
Mont... Oh, that's right. You're the prince of Leonis.
Y-yes, but...
I've heard the prince of Leonis is one of the finest swordsmen in the land, with a temper to boot.
Lady Machérie, I believe you are mistaking him for the other prince, Prince Sterne.
Oh, now I remember. Twin princes. As similar as a moogle and a malboro.
I see that now...
Well then, Crown Prince. Give us a show.
